data.eml:eml: A new species of Enderleina Jewett (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from Amazonas State, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hamada, N., Silva, J. O., Pedroza, M. K. (2016): A new species of Enderleina Jewett (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from Amazonas State, Brazil. Zootaxa 4098 (2): 392-400, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.2.11
